overview: From 2025-10-19 to 2025-10-26, Sendo-labs/leaderboard had 4 new PRs (4 merged), 0 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: add json endpoints
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
# Add JSON Leaderboard API Endpoints

## Summary

This PR adds static JSON API endpoints for leaderboard data, enabling external applications, mobile apps, and third-party integrations to consume leaderboard information programmatically.

## Features

- **Three time periods**: Monthly, weekly, and lifetime leaderboards
- **Comprehensive scoring**: Includes total score plus breakdown by contribution type (PR, issue, review, comment)
- **Wallet addresses**: Includes Solana and Ethereum wallet addresses from GitHub profiles
- **Calendar-based periods**: 
  - Weekly: Sunday to today
  - Monthly: 1st of month to today
  - Lifetime: Project start date to today
- **CLI command**: `bun run pipeline export-leaderboard`
- **CI/CD integration**: Automatically generates fresh leaderboard data on every deployment
- **Full test coverage**: 9 comprehensive tests covering all scenarios

## API Endpoints

The following static JSON files will be available via GitHub Pages:

- `/data/api/leaderboard-monthly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-weekly.json`
- `/data/api/leaderboard-lifetime.json`

## Response Format

```json
{
  "period": "monthly",
  "startDate": "2025-10-01",
  "endDate": "2025-10-23",
  "generatedAt": "2025-10-23T11:12:25.933Z",
  "totalUsers": 150,
  "leaderboard": [
    {
      "rank": 1,
      "username": "contributor1",
      "avatarUrl": "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/...",
      "score": 1234.5,
      "prScore": 800.0,
      "issueScore": 200.0,
      "reviewScore": 150.5,
      "commentScore": 84.0,
      "wallets": {
        "solana": "9xQeWvG816bUx9EPjHmaT23yvVM2ZWbrrpZb9PusVFin",
        "ethereum": "0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f0bEb"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

## Use Cases
- Mobile apps: Display leaderboard data in native applications
- Discord bots: Show contributor rankings and stats
- Analytics dashboards: Track contributor engagement over time
- Reward systems: Automate token distributions based on rankings
- Third-party integrations: Enable community-built tools and services

## Testing
All tests pass successfully:
- bun test src/lib/pipelines/export/exportLeaderboardAPI.test.ts

topContributors.summary: Neysixx: Focused on significant refactoring and feature development within the Sendo-labs/frontend repository this week. They merged several impactful PRs, including a large-scale page structure improvement (Sendo-labs/frontend#3), the addition of new pages (Sendo-labs/frontend#7), and a refactor of the worker-plugin (Sendo-labs/frontend#6). Additionally, they resolved a critical build issue by adding missing dependencies (Sendo-labs/frontend#5), with their work primarily centered on refactoring and feature implementation.

standujar: This week, standujar's primary impact was shipping the initial implementation of the Sendo Worker via a massive PR in `Sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker#1` (+13194/-60 lines). They also made smaller additions to the `Sendo-labs/leaderboard` project (#2, #3) and began establishing a comprehensive test infrastructure in a new PR. This work reflects a strong focus on new feature development and testing.

xdrkush: This week, xdrkush focused on the `sendo-api` repository, merging a significant PR to address an issue with buy/sell account functionality (Sendo-labs/sendo-api#3). This contribution involved a substantial change of +510/-225 lines. Their work was evenly split between bug fixes and feature development, with modifications primarily to code and test files.

M4XGO: Focused on improving project infrastructure by establishing an automated release and NPM publishing workflow for the `Sendo-labs/plugin-cryptoscore` repository (PR #2). This foundational work was supported by 22 commits across 50 files, indicating a clear focus on enhancing the project's configuration and release management processes.

tionebDotsamapha: This week, their efforts were directed towards improving project documentation. They merged a pull request in the Sendo-labs/sendo-api repository (#2) to update the README file. This work indicates a focus on documentation.
